channel.title: Golang Gotchas on Michael Knapp's Home Page
channel.description: Recent content in Golang Gotchas on Michael Knapp's Home Page

item.title: Checking for Nil
item.description: Programmers get baffled when a variable is considered not nil and then promptly panics because it is nil.

item.title: Iterating Over Values
item.description: Iterating over values can lead to surprising results.

item.title: Mutating Collections
item.description: You might be surprised by the results of a function mutating a collection.
